Text: Telstra: "Australian consumers can get better customer service in the Philippines or India" Me: "...and better CEOs from the U.S."  #greatpr
@KRuddMP If you and Malcolm DO want to start a new party, I'm happy to be your campaign manager. #AndIWillCallYouMalvinRuddbull
hey, look at this: http://bit.ly/2se5WZ
Telstra customers should be savvy enough to pay their bills by BPAY ... but not so savvy to wise up and move their phone services elsewhere.
Following the legal defeat, have advised Telstra Board to send my friend Gov. Arnold back in time to terminate Kevin Lindgren's mother.
Hey, Toadey, here's a tip for next time.  If you want to make $3M a year, don't drive a Corolla to the job interview.
Just turned down an offer to return to Australia for a taping of Spicks and Specks.
I guess "ass-backward" wasn't the kind of business-tourism-boosting quote Telstra expected when they bought my first-class ticket to London.
Organizers of "G'day UK" just called to ask if I'm still on.  What the hell!  London, here I come - Australia's favorite CEO.
Are you a member of a poorly governed board of directors?  Are your shareholders clueless and naive? Visit www.hireastarvingceo.com today.
Hey, if your accountant told you that you could make a $3M by quitting your job six weeks early, wouldn't you? ...and it's only Future Fund$
That Toadey! Funny guy. He just figured out my email password and send out an "I quit!" press release.  Not sure if I'll bother retracting.
John Rolland once said "Telstra employees who don't GET IT can find opportunities elsewhere". Today, John didn't GET IT. Tough call indeed.
Toadey is claiming that a $30/head/month cost of access is reasonable.  He also thinks my Golden Handshake is reasonable, God love him!
Like to thank Tom Lamming for serving as VP of Transformation (at just $15K/day!).  Together, we've transformed a $5 Telstra share into $3.
McG spun the bottle, kissed the Thod, aspired to prince, revealed as joker, replaced by a queen, left the deck - hey, why am I still here?
Tomorrow at Telstra HQ, McG spins the bottle and kisses either Stanhope, Moffatt or Thodey.  Who shall be the Obama to my Bush?
Possibly, I've contracted swine flu.  To be on the safe side, will ride it out in luxury spa in New Mexico before jetting off to "Gday UK".
The new social media guardrails must be working.  Checked Telstra posts all week and no-one's mentioned what an overpaid sack of sheet I am.
As per today's social media protocols, I shall no longer use tweets to bad-mouth the buffoons who are about to sign my $$$everence check.
The promise of super-speedy Internet is drawing Illegals by the boatloads.  I say "One Australia. One Medium!"  Keep it copper, mate.
If I was a Honda salesman, Rudd would still be offering every household FTTH - Ferrari To The Home.
Reminders for return to office: b-slap McG for being such a puss and make sure Stanhopeless shreds the cost-book.  I'm NOT taking the fall.
Just 80 days, amigo.  I'll be half way around the world in 80 days.
TLS share when I started, $5.06.  TLS this minute, $3.26.  A $33M tax-comped Golden Handshake that ain't fixed on share price, pricele$$ !!!
Sending McG to have 'constructive discussions' with Lil Stevie - if ya know what I mean...
I'm back at the poker table, mi perra!!!
